mapper.update: update region set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=TINYINT}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, code, parent_id, status, last_update_user, last_update_time, create_time, create_user from region where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, code, parent_id, status, last_update_user, last_update_time, create_time, create_user from region
